Netherbrain.synopsis: Players arrive at the Wide, and absolutists have taken over the area. Civilians are fleeing, players should prepare for battle.

CombatOver.synopsis: Players arrive at the Wide, and absolutists have taken over the area. Civilians are fleeing, players should prepare for battle.

Netherbrain_0.speaker: d8fbe495-9eb1-4e64-8c9b-20157027f0d5
Netherbrain_0.text: | You can never control me! Now die! |

CombatOver_0.speaker: Narrator
CombatOver_0.text: | *The netherbrain is under the control of the mindflayer in your party. Ending scenes follow.* |
